description:
Qualifications

  • Must have ability to work in a demanding and fast-paced environment with high-profile patients/clients.
  • Demonstrable experience with assisting both executive and donor health clientele/patients required.
  • Skill in working independently and following through on assignments with minimal direction.
  • Must have demonstrable and exemplary verbal, electronic, and telephonic communication skills.
  • Ability to represent UCLA in a positive, professional manner and to follow the practice guidelines in maintaining MHP’s presence and reputation within the Medical Enterprise.
  • Skill in assessment of customer satisfaction, with multiple metrics.
